title: Waco Mammoth National Monument: TEKS
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     TEKS                Texas Essential Knowledge and Skills (TEKS) Alignment          All educational activities at the Waco Mammoth National Monument are aligned with the Texas Essential Knowledge and Skills program. Here you can download the TEK standards for all the programs offered at the monument.  Coming Soon!  Basic School Program Big Dig Class program  Fossil Fun add-on program  Mighty Molars add-on program  Mobile Dig add-on program
